venue.name: Half Moon Coffee and Grille Cafe

item.description:
This meet up will be $1 per member. This is a BYBO location. Feel free to bring a bottle of wine to share. The food at Half Moon Cafe is delicious so plan on trying something new and different if you are interested in purchasing a meal or snack. We would like to welcome any new members who have been hesitant about coming. If you speak Italian, great! If you don't, great! You can bring your heritage or simply your interest.

We are Looking forward to making new amici!
item.name: Viva Italia Meet up Wallingford
